hero.title:

hero.subtitle: Oryx is the first specialized platform for property listings in Upper Egypt and the Red Sea. Buy, sell, and rent with confidence.

about.title: Why Oryx?
about.heading: Organizing the Real Estate Market in Upper Egypt
about.desc1: Oryx is a specialized PropTech platform for property listings and project promotions across Upper Egypt and the Red Sea. Built for the region’s unique market, Oryx empowers developers, brokers, and individual sellers to showcase residential, commercial, and land properties with ease.
about.desc2: Focused on transparency, simplicity, and local relevance, Oryx helps users list, promote, and discover properties efficiently.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Oryx.
faq.q1: How do I list my property?
faq.a1: You can easily list your property by downloading the Oryx app, creating an account, and clicking on the 'Add Property' button. Follow the simple steps to upload photos and details.
faq.a2: Yes, browsing properties on Oryx is completely free. We also offer free listing options for individual sellers.
faq.a3: We currently cover all major cities in Upper Egypt including Qena, Luxor, Aswan, Sohag, and Assiut, with plans to expand further.
